Class Cone

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • ThreeDimensionalShapes
        • ThreeDCurves
          • Cone

  • public class Cone
extends ThreeDCurves
    Class Cone is an extension ThreeDCurves as it shares methods and features with other Three dimensional curves such as radius, height, and a circle base.
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cone

        public Cone(java.lang.String shapeName,
            double radius,
            double height)
        Constructor of the Cone class. It passes the shapeName, radius, and height parameters to its parent class ThreeDCurves
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the user selected shape name.
        radius - The radius of the cones base held in a double.
        height - The height of the cone held in a double.

    • Method Detail

      • setSurfaceArea

        private static double setSurfaceArea(double radius,
                                     double height)
        Finds the surface area of the cone. The method is static as it is purely computational and is called during the class construction.
        Parameters:
        radius - Radius of the cone's base.
        height - Height of the cone.
        Returns:
        Returns the cones surface area as a double.

      • getVolume

        public double getVolume()
        Returns:
        returns volume as a double

      • getSurfaceArea

        public double getSurfaceArea()
        Returns:
        returns the surface area as a double
